GxzRg35XsK.lh_6ocof5_title: What is the Shopify to RE NXT Connector?
GxzRg35XsK.lh_axl7kz_content_html: The connector is an app that transfers donor data from Shopify orders (product purchase or donation) directly into Blackbaud Raiser’s Edge NXT.<!--lh-live-editor-->
GxzRg35XsK.lh_6ocrhe_title: Why would I need this app?
GxzRg35XsK.lh_axl7ky_content_html: If you are a non-profit or charity that runs an online or in person store using Shopify and want to have purchases easily transfer into your Blackbaud Raiser's Edge database this is the solution for you.<!--lh-live-editor-->
GxzRg35XsK.lh_6ocujn_title: What do I need to use this?
GxzRg35XsK.lh_axl7kx_content_html:
To use this you would need:
- A Shopify Store
- A Blackbaud RE NXT account
- Willingness to learn
GxzRg35XsK.lh_axl7kw_content_html:
Yes. There is an initial setup fee to get your organization connected ($1,000 CAD) and then a monthly fee of $50 CAD.

This cost helps to cover app updates, maintainence and our own costs to manage the servers that run the application. 

Any additional profits would get invested back into Grand River Hospital to support health care in our region.
GxzRg35XsK.lh_axl7kv_content_html:
Yes. The app does not store any donor data or personal information. 

Additionally we (Grand River Hospital Foundation) cannot access your donor information and you cannot access ours.
GxzRg35XsK.lh_u7m56g_content_html:
Transfers purchases in Shopify into Blackbaud Raiser’s Edge NXT automatically as a gift on a batch and on a donor record.

Looks for duplicate records and adds new donors to Blackbaud Raiser’s Edge NXT when necessary.

Updates donor addresses when an order is placed.

Allows you to set default Campaign, Appeal and Fund on any product when importing into Blackbaud Raiser’s Edge NXT. This can be customized on a per product and per product variant basis.

Allows you to see what product they purchased on the gift record in Blackbaud Raiser’s Edge NXT and provides a reference back to finding the order in Shopify.

Allows you to track if the gift needs a receipt or not in Blackbaud Raiser’s Edge NXT.

Provides an error message automatically to you if a gift cannot be added into RE making your life stress free.
GxzRg35XsK.lh_u7m56f_content_html:
If you came to this page directly from another site such as Blackbaud Marketplace you might now know who we are. 

Grand River Hospital Foundation  raises funds to help Grand River Hospital provide exceptional health care. 

With the support from generous donors and loyal community partnerships, Grand River Hospital Foundation is able to grant funds for medical equipment and technology; renovation projects; and local clinical and health research and education. 

The commitment to health care in our region ensures that the residents of Waterloo Region and Guelph Wellington will have access to the best health care services close to home.

ONnHqvPMQX.lh_5r8yyn_title: Why choose Bamboo as a material?
ONnHqvPMQX.lh_ku5mxb_desc_html: Bamboo is the fastest growing plant on earth. Because it contains naturally-occurring antimicrobial agents, there is no need for using fertilizers or pesticides during its cultivation. Our bamboo is totally organic and wild<!--lh-live-editor-->
ONnHqvPMQX.lh_anmdz4_title: Is this an authentic Uno? And does Uno ships the iron?
ONnHqvPMQX.lh_ku5mxa_desc_html: There is something about parenthood that gives us a sense of history and a deeply rooted desire to send on into the next generation the great things we have discovered about life. 4igtdwodg6t.lh_a168_desc_html: "If you’ve been at Grand River Hospital in recent months, you may be struck, as we were by the added pressures COVID has placed on hospital staff, and how hard they are working to provide the best possible care in very difficult circumstances. As the hospital braces for the third and perhaps worst phase of Covid 19, Larry and I have made a commitment to help our local health care heroes at Grand River Hospital by providing inspiration and support that is outside the envelope the government can support. We’ve made a commitment to use our experience, and compassion for health care workers as a catalyst for a grass roots, community-wide, demonstration of support. Please join us."

9z1fifqpj7d.text1: JOIN US AUGUST 12, 2022 at NEW DUNDEE GOLF & COUNTRY CLUB  -

dwp78wf2cke.lh_4mruur_content_html: Join us in supporting 2 new MRI's in Waterloo Region at this brand new, high-quality golf tournament designed to foster connection and support from industry and the IT experts & leaders at these two great hospitals.
